name: Dance Dance Revolution Solo Bass Mix
overview: Dance Dance Revoution Solo Bass Mix is the first short-lived and spin-off dancing arcade game from Konami. The gameplay is similar like the original Dance Dance Revolution (stepping on the arrows at the right timing along the music to earn points and reach the next stage by dancing good) but here as the name says you play as single (solo) player and the dance pad controller has now 6 panels (two upper diagonal more panels), you can choose between 3 game modes such as beginner, expert and nonstop megamix mode like the first DDR game and it has 16 songs coming from Dancemania BASS compilation (12 licensed songs and 4 Konami original songs).
